name: Changes to the Barbarian Class on the WoG PW
author: Stagmeister

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hello All

Just a quick note to inform folk who don't yet know, the World of Greyhawk PW has recently implemented some changes to the Barbarian class. Please see the second post in the link below for details (point 16 in DM Wise's post in particular). This will obviously have an impact here if we get build requests intended for WoG play, and likewise for people building for that particular world.

WoG Barbarian Changes

Cheers

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content: Also, that the Harper Scout has UMD as a cross-class skill.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content: Thanks, Web, I'd forgotten about that one.
